author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Hideo Kojima celebrated 10 years of Kojima Productions with a special livestream during the Tokyo Game Show. The event also looked forward to some of the company's upcoming projects, including a new trailer for OD—now titled OD: Knock—and a new poster and casting updates for his spy thriller, Physint. There's also a Death Stranding anime called Mosquito, and updates on the live-action A24-produced Death Stranding movie. In other news, Sony has announced the replacement for the PlayStation Stars rewards program, only this new Franchise Rewards system miight end up costing you money instead. And finally, Sony has announced a new State of Play for tomorrow, Wednesday September 23rd. We'll get new looks at Housemarque's Saros, and updates and new reveals on other games.
title: Hideo Kojima Reveals OD Trailer, Physint Poster & Death Stranding 2 Anime - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Crush every foe. Meet Darius and see this character in action in this latest 2XKO trailer for the upcoming free-to-play 2v2 fighting game, featuring the iconic champions from League of Legends. In 2XKO, team up with or against friends for explosive 2v2 showdowns, mastering a variety of unique tag and assist mechanics to take down the enemy duo. 2XKO will be available in Early Access on PC on October 7, 2025.
title: 2XKO - Official Darius Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Dilly Dally Update Launch Trailer for Peak, a first-person comedic climbing multiplayer game developed by Team Peak. Players will be able to access new features with the latest update to the game, including Rebindable Controls, mini-games to play and experience at the Airport including basketball, chess, photobooth, and more. The Dilly Dally Update for Peak is available now for PC (Steam).
title: Peak - Official Dilly Dally Update Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Step into the nightmare of Silent Hill f with these must-know tips, tricks, and hidden mechanics that the game doesn’t explain. Playing as Hinako, you’ll face shifting realities, terrifying monsters, and a world that blurs the line between sanity and horror. This guide breaks down combat mechanics, weapons, consumables, and survival strategies to help you stay alive in Silent Hill f.
title: Silent Hill f: 8 Tips for Early Survival

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for The Bride!, an upcoming film from Maggie Gyllenhaal (Academy Award-nominated writer/director of The Lost Daughter). The Bride! stars Jessie Buckley, Christian Bale, Annette Bening, Peter Sarsgaard, Jake Gyllenhaal, and Penélope Cruz. 

A lonely Frankenstein (Bale) travels to 1930s Chicago to ask groundbreaking scientist Dr. Euphronious (Annette Bening) to create a companion for him. The two revive a murdered young woman and The Bride (Buckley) is born. What ensues is beyond what either of them imagined: Murder! Possession! A wild and radical cultural movement! And outlaw lovers in a wild and combustible romance!

Maggie Gyllenhaal directs from her own screenplay and produces alongside Oscar nominee Emma Tillinger Koskoff, Talia Kleinhendler and Osnat Handelsman Keren. The executive producers are Carla Raij, David Webb and Courtney Kivowitz.

Gyllenhaal is supported behind the camera by a team of award-winning film artisans, including director of photography L
title: The Bride! - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Jessie Buckley, Christian Bale, Jake Gyllenhaal

Tune in for the Nioh 3 Tokyo Game Show Official Program. The producers of Nioh 3 will share exciting aspects and the latest news of the game, as well as explore and take on a formidable enemy while showcasing gameplay. The stream begins on Thursday, September 25 at 4AM PT/ 8PM JST.

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description: Watch the Season ‘War Ablaze’ Cinematic Trailer for Delta Force, a free-to-play first-person multiplayer action shooter developed by Team Jade. Players can now access a brand new season for Delta Force, packed with new content from maps, Operators, and more. Take a look at the cinematic trailer diving deep into the history between Raptor and D-wolf in Season War Ablaze for Delta Force, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).
title: Delta Force - Official Season ‘War Ablaze’ Cinematic Trailer

Sony State of Play returns September 24, 2025! Tune in live for more than 35 minutes of updates and reveals from PlayStation Studios and partners around the world.  The State of Play begins September 24 at 2pm PT / 5pm ET / 11pm CEST | September 25 at 6am JST. See you there! 

#IGN #Gaming #PlayStation

author: IGN
description:
A new mode is coming. Check out the latest Painkiller trailer for this upcoming co-op first-person action shooter game to see what to expect with Rogue Angel, a new roguelike game mode. Separate from the main campaign, Rogue Angel takes players to a new realm of Purgatory, where you and your friends will advance through procedurally generated arenas, collect tarot cards, weapons, and items along the way, and take on epic bosses. Painkiller will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam on October 21, 2025.

In Painkiller, welcome to Purgatory! You’ve been sentenced for your transgressions against Heaven, but the Voice of the Creator is giving you one chance to redeem yourself. Blast through hordes of demons in brutal, fast-paced combat with an array of infernal weapons. Battle across gruesome gothic environments to stop the fallen angel Azazel’s invasion of Earth and earn your salvation – solo or in online co-op for up to three players.
title: Painkiller - Official Rogue Angel (Roguelike Mode) Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Baby Steps reviewed by Travis Northup on PC. Also available on PlayStation 5.

"I wasn’t expecting one of my favorite games of 2025 to be about a socially awkward blob in a stained onesie with such poor motor skills that he ragdolls to the ground on the slightest of uneven surfaces, but here we are. Baby Steps is a triumphantly quirky physics game that asks you to challenge yourself, both with alluring hiking obstacles that had me screaming to the heavens and a shockingly unconventional story and characters that ended up feeling like family by the end. Despite centering itself around intentionally awkward controls, it has a deceptive level of depth that made me eager to master it, and I got incredibly lost in the sauce as I tried to best its most daunting challenges. If you like a good laugh, extreme difficulty, or just hate yourself, then I can’t recommend Baby Steps enough."
title: Baby Steps Review

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the new content available in Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake in this latest trailer for the upcoming RPG. In Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake, discover the mysterious Ocean Floor, uncover hidden scrolls and sigils, and try your luck with the tombola. Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake is reimagined with new content and enhancements, including an expanded story, new NPCs, the addition of mini-medals, new dungeons, and more. Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D will be available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X and S, Windows PC, and Steam on October 30, 2025.

#DragonQuest #IGN #Gaming
title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake - Official New Content Trailer

description:
In this first-ever adaptation of the acclaimed stealth video game Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell, legendary agent Sam Fisher (voiced by Liev Schreiber) is drawn back into the field when a wounded young operative seeks out his help. 

Produced by Ubisoft, in partnership with Derek Kolstad (John Wick), Sun Creature and Fost. The animated series Splinter Cell: Deathwatch launches on Netflix on October 14, 2025 at 12:00 AM PDT.

#IGN
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch Exclusive Opening Credits Sequence (2025) Liev Schreiber

author: IGN
description:
Ubisoft and developer Massive Entertainment have announced From the Ashes, a new story expansion for Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, the 2023 first-person shooter set in James Cameron's Avatar universe. From the Ashes will be available on December 19 – the same day as Cameron's upcoming Avatar: Fire and Ash film.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora – From the Ashes DLC Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Night of the Hunter Update' Update 1.6 Trailer for Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, a first-person open-world survival game developed by GSC Game World. Players can access all-new gadgets and features to make the night more manageable in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, such as the inclusion of night vision devices, offset aiming for improved precision, and more to take on the new anomalies in-game. The 'Night of the Hunter Update' Update 1.6 is available now for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam, GoG, Epic Games Store).

#Stalker2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official 'Night of the Hunter Update' Update 1.6 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Reveal Trailer for Palworld: Palfarm, a farming creature-collecting simulation spin-off to Palworld developed by Pocketpair. Players will make use of their Pals to tend to their gardens, making use of each Pal's distinct ability. Sow seeds, water the harvest, and defend the farm from other Pals looking to cause chaos on the island. Palworld: Palfarm is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#PalworldPalfarm #Gaming #IGN
title: Palworld: Palfarm - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the dub trailer for the anime movie 100 Meters! In select theatres October 10. In theatres nationwide October 12-14.

100 METERS follows Togashi, a track star who is born to run. As a kid, he is naturally gifted and wins every 100-meter race without effort. But in sixth grade, he meets Komiya, a transfer student who is full of determination but lacks technique. In teaching him, Togashi gives Komiya a new purpose: to win no matter what. Years pass by, and Togashi and Komiya meet again as rivals on the track and reveal their true selves.

#IGN #Anime
title: 100 METERS - Official Trailer (English Dub)

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Console Launch Trailer for Wizordum, a retro first-person boomer shooter developed by Emberheart Games. Players will set out to face the source of Chaos at all costs. Make use of an array of weapons, items, and spells to progress through Terrabruma. Wizordum is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch, alongside the release on PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at gameplay from Ananta in this latest trailer for the upcoming free-to-play urban open-world RPG. Dive into the vibrant anime-style world of Ananta in this new 7-minute trailer that showcases combat, various city locations, and characters. Ananta will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and mobile platforms.


Ananta is an urban open-world RPG with a high degree of freedom where you play as a variety of characters. In this city, the world is your oyster to dig in and explore, from bustling business districts to hidden alleyways. Venture to different neighborhoods and rub shoulders with an intriguing cast of characters as you assemble your own crew for adventure and exploration. Throughout the adventure, players will join forces and take a stand against hidden threats lurking within the shadows or live it up and bask in the urban nightlife under the neon glow of the city. The choice is yours, as calamity and the commonplace intermingle freely. In Ananta, a whole
title: Ananta - Official Gameplay Trailer #2

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Robin Hood trailer for this upcoming MGM+ series. From Lionsgate Television and co-created by executive producers John Glenn and Jonathan English (who also directed the pilot), and Todd Lieberman of Hidden Pictures, who was also an executive producer, Robin Hood stars Jack Patten as Rob, Lauren McQueen as Marian, Sean Bean as the Sheriff of Nottingham, Lydia Peckham as Priscilla of Nottingham, Steven Waddington as the Earl of Huntingdon and Connie Nielsen as Queen Eleanor of Aquitaine.

In 12th-century England, Saxons live under the crushing rule of Norman power. Among them is Robert of Locksley, the son of a forester, whose life is shattered when his family is stripped of their ancestral home and his father is executed by the Sheriff of Nottingham. Gifted with the longbow, Rob grows from grief into rebellion, his fate forever entwined with Marian, a noblewoman torn between loyalty to her family and her love for him. As tensions rise, Rob gathers a band of outlaws around
title: Robin Hood - Official Trailer (2025) Jack Patten, Sean Bean, Lauren McQueen
